about_the_game:
In the game "The Police Interceptors Simulator: War Against Racers," you will be able to test yourself in various scenarios, such as chasing racers, stopping armed bandits, providing road assistance, and much more.
Embark on diverse missions and tasks that will present you with new challenges and difficulties. Apply all your police skills, tactics, and agility to successfully complete each mission.

Choose from different police cars with unique characteristics to confront various types of racers. Hit the city streets behind the wheel of fast sports cars and reliable patrol vehicles. Each of them has its own features, such as speed, maneuverability, durability, and special technologies that will help you pursue and stop dangerous racers.
Earn rewards and money for successfully completed missions to upgrade and modify your cars for better performance and efficiency. This will help you fight illegal racers more effectively.

Confront dangerous and cunning racers with various skills and tactics who will try to avoid arrest at any cost. Criminals may use various evasion techniques to confuse and destabilize you. You will need to stay one step ahead to decipher their strategies and stop them. Prepare for unpredictable situations and tough decisions during pursuits.

Immerse yourself in the thrilling world of street racing with enhanced graphics and sound effects. The high-quality graphics in the game will bring realism to every detail, from dynamic cars to picturesque details of the surrounding world.

Get ready for thrilling police chases and unpredictable situations in the game "The Police Interceptors Simulator: War Against Racers." Download the game right now and show your skills in fighting crime on the roads!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: You will become part of an elite police squad. Your mission is to engage in battles with unpredictable street racers who pose a danger to ordinary citizens on the roads. You will have to control various police vehicles and use your skills and tactics to apprehend and stop these dangerous offenders.
